answerText: Penthesilea[10] Another fighter for the Trojans was this Ethiopian king, a son of the dawn.
heading: DRAGOON |2013 | 8 | 6 | Literature | Classical | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Quintus of Smyrna's epic poem begins with a description of this warrior-woman. [10] Name this Amazon who fought for the Trojans in the Trojan War. After she was killed, her slayer mourned her, probably by having sex with her corpse.
